name: Wide Feedly
description: The same Feedly you know, only wider. Can be used in conjunction with Hauschild's Dark Feedly.
additional_info: Unlike Hauschild's Dark Feedly, this does change the layout - as in "disposition of things" - of Feedly. It was born out of my need to taylor Feedly to better suit photography and design blogs. By default, Feedly displays images in a low resolution. I've changed it to better suit high resolution monitors. Updates: 2017-08-17 - Fixed width of iframes. 2014-11-08 - Fixed a lot of small things. 2013-07-04 - Tweaked the layout for better readability on really wide monitors. 2013-06-30 - Made it compatible with cloud.feedly.com.
